channel.title: How can i change prices on items
channel.description: i want to change the price so when you lets say sell the gold to shop its 5k. can you tell me how to do so?

item.title: How can i change prices on items
item.dc:creator: @pkinnubpk pkinnubpk
item.description:
@pkinnubpk wrote:

goto item.cfg and search 995, find it and it will have 5000 5000 5000 0 0 0 0 ect, change the 5000 to how much you want tom sell it for!( you mite want to find a tut to show you how to make it so you cant sell it to the shop)

Read full topic
item.source: How can i change prices on items
